[Information]

With their delicate beauty and cheerful colors, flowers have always been the top rank decoration for designers, decorators, and event planners. And with our intricately handcrafted Paper Peony Giant Flowers, you can now give an everlasting radiant color to your Party Tables, Centerpieces, Garden Décor, Backdrops, Photo Booths, etc. Imitating the strikingly natural construction of real Peonies, these giant 3D paper peony blossoms feature gorgeous layers of fluffed petals and fully detailed pistil center. With the sturdy backing, these giant flowers have the ability to hang on walls or curtains, or for a long lasting setup, use with our Glue Dots to stick strongly on backgrounds, walls, tables, arches, aisle, trees, ceiling, and any other space that deserves a boost of colorful magic.

entry.title: 54" x 72" Royal Blue 10 Mil Thick Waterproof Tablecloth PVC Rectangle Disposable Tablecloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2250
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 1.58 - 17.68 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
Material: Plastic
Color: Royal Blue
Product Length: 72 inches
Product Width: 54 inches
Product Thickness: 10 mil
Design : Solid
Shape: Rectangle
Reusable: Yes
Seamless: yes
Durable: Yes
Waterproof: Yes
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Eliminate the hassle of cleaning the table cloths and keeping them wrinkle free. These accident resistant heavy duty plastic table cloths are sturdy enough to avoid tears and rips, and an ideal choice for outdoor/ indoor parties, birthday bashes, banquets and other culinary events. We offer these durable, disposable and upscale quality plastic Waterproof Tablecloth to solve the budgetary challenges usually faced by professional party planners, family reunion organizers, and themed birthday party planners.

    Multi-Use

    These table covers are an ideal choice for any occasions. Speed up cleaning so you can turn tables faster! You'll never have to waste time and money laundering linen table covers again.

    Decorative

    Aside from its elegance, it effectively repels water, making it ideal for protecting tables from spills. You'll never have to worry about juice or wine spilling across the table again.

    Durable

    Our Waterproof Tablecloth is made from high quality PVC plastic which gives you superior strength and durability and also provides the convenience of disposability that your events require.

    Additional Information:

    • Uses : Wedding, Birthday, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration
    • Note : For table cover only, no other decorations are included.

entry.title: 85" x 85" Royal Blue Pintuck Square Overlay
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2220
Type: Overlays
Price: 9.88 - 225.28 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Table Overlay
Material: Taffeta Pintuck
Color: Royal Blue
Size: 85" x 85"
Each Square Measures: 3" x 3"
Edges: Serged
How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, Don't use a dryer.
Perfect to be used on top of our tablecloths as accents.
Can be used for weddings, banquets, or any type of celebration.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Pintuck is actually a fold of fabric that is stitched intricately to hold it in a place, very much like a pleat. These lovely pleats impart a decorative effect to the fabric by fashioning a visual line at a chosen point. They effortlessly bridge vintage and contemporary styles to create a majestic new classic look. If you do not want your celebration to blend in with other weddings, birthdays, and anniversaries, try our premium quality pintuck overlays that contain everything you need to lend your event the look and aura that it deserves. Celebrate your special day with our splendid square pintuck style table cloths spread elegantly atop your plain and ordinary table covers. Be the show stopper by designing some awesome bows and other accents with pintuck patterns and style. Create an inviting ambiance for your guests by throwing a pintuck theme ambiance containing squared pattern napkins, sashes, runners, and linens.

Additional Information:

  • Measurements: 85" x 85" Square
  • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
  • Material: Taffeta Pintuck. Edges are Serged.
  • Each square measures: 3"x3".
  • Perfect to be used on top of our tablecloths as accents.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
